Detailed Description

Model that contains the items to set the active views for component instances.

void ActiveViewModel::setActiveView ( const QString &  instanceName,
const QString &  viewName 
) [slot]

Set the active view for given component instance.

NOTE: Using this function to set the active view for instance does not generate commands to the undo/redo stack.

Parameters:
